channel.title: Getting Started :: Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: During this technical Optimize Cloud Monitoring Workshop, you will build out an environment based on a lightweight Kubernetes1 cluster. To simplify the workshop modules, a pre-configured AWS/EC2 instance is provided. The instance is pre-configured with all the software required to deploy the Splunk OpenTelemetry Connector2 and the microservices-based OpenTelemetry Demo Application3 in Kubernetes which has been instrumented using OpenTelemetry to send metrics, traces, spans and logs. This workshop will introduce you to the benefits of standardized data collection, how content can be re-used across teams, correlating metrics and logs, and creating detectors to fire alerts. By the end of these technical workshops, you will have a good understanding of some of the key features and capabilities of the Splunk Observability Cloud.
